projectJson.title: JCord
projectJson.description: JCord is a chat application modeled after Discord and developed using JavaFX SDK. To use this application, the user must enter a name and add a picture. After doing so, users can send messages and emojis to other users of the application, by typing in the text field at the bottom of the application or clicking on the emoji symbol to display available emojis that could be sent. The chat log is will update the chat list with the latest messages upon using the application as well as showing online users.
